      • secondLastLessThanLast

        public static boolean secondLastLessThanLast​(int[] data)
        Parameters:
        data -
        Returns:
        false if array passed is null or has less than two items, otherwise return true if the second last item is less than the last item, otherwise return false

      • getMedian

        public static int getMedian​(int[] data)
        Parameters:
        data -
        Returns:
        the item in the "middle" of the array. when the array has an even number of items, you should return the item to the right of the "splitting line"

      • getSumFirstLastItems

        public static int getSumFirstLastItems​(int[] data)
        Parameters:
        data -
        Returns:
        0 if the array passed is null or has less than two items, otherwise return the sum of the first and the last items

        idx -
        Returns:
        true if an item exists in the passed array at the passed index, false otherwise

                      int idx)
        Parameters:
        data -
        idx -
        Returns:

      • generate

        public static int[] generate​(int n)
        Parameters:
        n -
        Returns:
        if n is less than zero, return null otherwise return an array of size n

      • sameSize

        public static boolean sameSize​(int[] a,
                               int[] b)
        Parameters:
        a -
        b -
        Returns:
        true if the two arrays have the same number of items. return false if either is null

      • sameItemAt

                                 int[] b,
                                 int idx)
        Parameters:
        a -
        b -
        idx -
        Returns:
        true if both arrays passed have the same item at the passed index, return false is all other scenarios
